item.title: Asynchronous Programming
item.description: Why Care? Browsing through job postings you often notice a job requirement along the lines of: Able to write highly efficient asynchronous code. A fleeting thought: “Ah this just means writing efficient code in terms of Big-O and then split and farm out work to it by using a solution (language feature, library, framework, …) someone else has already come up with.” You skip over this requirement without much more thought.
